contents:
关于生育能力 这里有篇文章

https://www.givelegacy.com/resources/will-covid-19-affect-male-fertility/
总结是理论上有可能 因为跟sars的相似性，但目前还没有任何evidence 

“At present it is somewhat premature to conclude [that] COVID-19 will definitely affect male fertility,” Dr. Pacey explains. “But it is useful that the authors have raised this concern.”
